KeywordCoverage.Context: Resume focuses on service, safety, logistics, and maintenance with introductory QA/frontend training; technical software/testing keywords are sparse and mostly appear in the training section.

Summary: Service-oriented professional transitioning to technology with 10 years of experience across citizen services, safety, logistics, and technical operations; recently completed training in Manual QA and Frontend React (Coderhouse). Brings strong customer focus, scheduling and coordination skills, safety discipline, and hands-on troubleshooting. Seeking a junior QA/manual testing or trainee frontend role to apply transferable strengths while building practical experience with modern tools and workflows.
Strengths: Strong customer service and coordination background
Safety mindset and reliability from lifeguard roles
Discipline and accountability in operational environments
Motivation to learn with recent QA/frontend coursework
AreasToImprove: Build a portfolio with 2–3 concrete QA or React projects
Adopt core tooling and workflows (Git, Jira, Agile, Postman, basic SQL)
Practice test design and automation basics (test cases, defect reports, Selenium/Playwright)
Tips: Create a GitHub portfolio: one Manual QA project (test plan, cases, bug reports) and one React app with README and screenshots.
Add specific tooling to the CV (Git/GitHub, Postman, SQL basics, Jira) and list simple measurable outcomes (e.g., reduced rework by X%).
Include a brief Tech Stack section and a Skills section grouped by QA, Frontend, and Operations.
Obtain an entry-level certification or complete a capstone (e.g., ISTQB Foundation or a QA portfolio project).
Link live demos for any frontend exercises and include accessibility/responsiveness notes.

PABLO GUILLERMO GOROSITO | Barcelona, 08013, Spain | Nationality: Italian | Email: pablo.92pgg@gmail.com | Driving License: AM, A1, A2, A, B

• Managed drivers and vehicle maintenance; prepared, cleaned, and inspected vehicles prior to delivery.

• Performed last-mile logistics by motorcycle, ensuring punctual deliveries.

• Responsible for user safety, accident prevention, and pool maintenance.
